name: Marvel Comic Characters Quiz / Test | Marvel Comics | 10 Questions

questions.text: What team of superheroes does Captain America lead?
questions.explanation:
Avengers.

	Captain America is basically a normal human, except that the Super-Soldier serum he was injected with in WWII has made him reach the ultimate potential of the human body.

questions.text: Shatterstar was a leading member of which team?
questions.explanation:
X-Force.

	Shatterstar, in his original body, was a genetically engineered warrior with enhanced senses and physical abilities. He also had hollow bones and genes very similar to those of Longshot. Aside from being a master swordsman and a superb athlete, Shatterstar has a seldom-used mutant power to channel energy through his sword.

questions.text: What team has Wolverine been associated with the longest?
questions.explanation:
X-Men.

	Wolverine has a healing factor that can heal virtually any wound or disease and also slows his aging. Logan also has retractable bone claws that extrude from his forearms. His bones and claws were bonded with adamantium, rendering them unbreakable. That was until Magneto pulled the adamantium out.

questions.text: What team is the Blob associated with?
questions.explanation:
Brotherhood of Evil Mutants.

	The Blob can increase his body's density until he is virtually immovable.

questions.text: Sebastian Shaw is associated with what team?
questions.explanation:
HellFire Club.

	Sebastian Shaw absorbs kinetic energy on impact and rechannels it into physical strength. It also increases his hardiness and endurance.

questions.text: Corsair is associated with what team?
questions.explanation:
StarJammers.

	Corsair's real name is Christopher Summers. He is the father of Scott (Cyclops) and Alex (Havok).

questions.text: Chamber was associated with what team?
questions.explanation:
Generation X.

	Chamber used to belong to Generation X until they disbanded and he was made an X-Man. His real name is Jonathon Starsmore. Chamber's entire body is composed of intense psionic energy, which he can expel as an energy blast. He can also communicate psionically, a necessity considering that he has no mouth, lungs or vocal cords.

questions.text: Daytripper is associated with what team?
questions.explanation:
Excalibur.

	Her real name is Jimaine Szardos, aka Amanda Sefton. She has magical abilities including spell-casting, shape-shifting and teleportation.

questions.text: Shard is associated with what team?
questions.explanation:
X-Factor.

	Shard is the X-Men's Bishop's sister. She too comes from the future, but is actually deceased. Recreated by Forge for Bishop, she is now a living hologram.

questions.text: What team is Professor X associated with?
questions.explanation:
X-Men.

	Professor X is a telepath, probably an omnipath, and certainly the most powerful one in the world. He is responsible for the creation of the X-Men and the ideals they stand for.
